title: Patent Patrol: Spreng Reng’s variable tooth valley radius changes gearing w/o changing teeth?
content:
Spreng Reng has long promised extra watts due to the unique hexagonal shape. It’s also easy to write off Spreng Reng as a BioPace descendant, though it’s got several unique features that set it apart. You can read about that here. Now Spreng Reng is making it official by filing a patent for its chainring […]

The post Patent Patrol: Spreng Reng’s variable tooth valley radius changes gearing w/o changing teeth? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Dan Cavallari
